name: Space Rift NON-VR - Episode 1
description: Be part of the action! SPACE RIFT is the first part of a breathtaking action space adventure with a captivating story!Originally developed for virtual reality, this version has been optimized for non-VR gaming fun without a VR headset.Join the fight for the freedom of humanity on Mars!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
